attributes.action: Make DT a subject choice in all schools so more students can pursue STEM careers
attributes.background: We think that DT should be made a subject choice in all schools seeing as there is an increasing pressure for students to study STEM subjects and all students should have the opportunity to study DT and discover whether they like it or not.

rejection.details: Apart from compulsory subjects, it's up to schools to decide which subjects they want to offer.
